itunes:title: Episode 620 - DB Sports Companion Show 06/16/20 - NBA Playoff Preview
title: Episode 620 - DB Sports Companion Show 06/16/20 - NBA Playoff Preview
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway go over their over/unders for the NBA season including underdog teams such as the Houston Rockets and the Denver Nuggets, the two determine whether or not Kyrie Irving is going to play in this season, and at the end of the...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway go over their over/unders for the NBA season including underdog teams such as the Houston Rockets and the Denver Nuggets, the two determine whether or not Kyrie Irving is going to play in this season, and at the end of the show, they both get disgusted by photos of professional athletes’ feet.

ghostbed.com/drinkinbros
